title: Gluten free double chocolate brownies
ingredients: ['75g unsweetened cocoa powder', '75g buckwheat flour', '75g brown rice flour', '1 teaspoon gluten-free baking powder', "1 teaspoon xanthan gum (Dove's Farm makes it)", '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '200g 70% cocoa dark vegan chocolate chips', '225g agave syrup', '2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract', '150g (about 2 small) mashed bananas', '150g unsweetened applesauce', '150g chopped pitted dates', 'For topping', '100g 70% cocoa dark vegan chocolate chips']
